00009 abstract class ns {
00010 
00021     public static function import($sModulePath = '') {
00022 
00023         // get last section of import path: module name
00024         $sModuleName = substr(strrchr($sModulePath, '.'), 1);
00025 
00026         // check to see if module is already imported
00027         if (class_exists($sModuleName)) return false;
00028 
00029         // get first section of import path: package name
00030         $sPackageName = substr($sModulePath, 0, strpos($sModulePath, '.'));
00031 
00032         // directory of current file (this one)
00033         $strFileDir = dirname(__FILE__);
00034 
00035         // package root directory
00036         $strRoot = substr($strFileDir, 0, strpos($strFileDir, $sPackageName));
00037 
00038         // full path name to requested module
00039         $strFullPath = $strRoot . str_replace('.', DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, $sModulePath) . '.class.php';
00040 
00041         // check if file exists
00042         if (!file_exists($strFullPath)) return false;
00043 
00044         // include it
00045         return include_once($strFullPath);
00046     }
